message: Accept and we can split the money now, or I'll make a better offer next round.
You're starting strong, I'll try to do better than that!
You think you can outdo me? I'll make an even better offer next round!
You think you can outdo me? I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're being generous, but I think I can do better than that!
You think you're getting a good deal? I'll give you even less next round, just you wait!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. Take it or leave it!
You're not getting any more generous, I'm not getting any more desperate!
You think you're being clever, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you even less next round!
You're getting close to desperation, Bob. Don't make me make you an offer you can't refuse!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'm getting there. Don't think you can just push me around!
You're not as tough as you think you are, Bob. I'll make you an offer you'll regret rejecting!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it, but don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not out of time yet, I've still got a few tricks up my sleeve!
You think you've got tricks up your sleeve, Bob? I've got a few tricks of my own!
You've been playing hard to get, Bob. Let's just split it down the middle and be done with it!
